content.raw:
Can't seem to run valkyrie controller now. Even on an old computer, I upgraded ros-indigo-ihmc-valkyrie-ros and it requires me to build the controller, which fails looking for the files as reported above.

We cannot develop until this is fixed because we have no information about the final tasks, we already lost a weekend's work.
content.html:
Can't seem to run valkyrie controller now. Even on an old computer, I upgraded ros-indigo-ihmc-valkyrie-ros and it requires me to build the controller, which fails looking for the files as reported above.

We cannot develop until this is fixed because we have no information about the final tasks, we already lost a weekend's work.
